meanings.sent1: She felt the soft fabric with her fingertips.
meanings.sent2: He counted the coins using his fingertips.
meanings.sent3: The kitten playfully batted at the string with its tiny fingertips.
meanings.sent4: Her fingertips danced across the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully blended the colors with delicate fingertips, creating a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The extreme end or tip of the finger.
meanings.sent1: The chef chopped the vegetables with precision, using the fingertips.
meanings.sent2: She could feel the rough texture with her fingertips.
meanings.sent3: The fingertips of the glove were starting to wear out from constant use.
meanings.sent4: His fingertips were stained with ink after working on the art project.
meanings.sent5: The fingertips of the statue were so detailed, they looked almost real.
